org.jamsim.ascape.weights

Class CategoricalVarWeightCalc

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • org.jamsim.ascape.weights.CategoricalVarWeightCalc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WeightCalculator, ParameterSet

    public class CategoricalVarWeightCalc
extends Observable
implements WeightCalculator
    Calculates weights for each factor level of a single variable.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

      Construct a set of weightings at each factor level of variableName and load the initial values of the weight numerators from prefs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CategoricalVarWeightCalc

        public CategoricalVarWeightCalc(ScapeRInterface scapeR,
                        String rVariable,
                        String variableName,
                        String variableDesc,
                        double scaling,
                        Preferences prefs)
                         throws RFaceException,
                                InvalidDataException
        Construct a set of weightings at each factor level of variableName and load the initial values of the weight numerators from prefs.
        Parameters:
        scapeR - scape R interface
        rVariable - the R variable that will be used as the basis for weighting, eg: children$sol1
        variableName - the name of the R variable, eg: sol1
        variableDesc - description of the R variable. Used for display purposes.
        scaling - an amount to multiple every weight by
        prefs - Preferences that store the state of the weightings
        Throws:
        RFaceException - if problem reading category proportions of variable from R
        InvalidDataException - if weights do not sum to 1. See validate().

      • CategoricalVarWeightCalc

        public CategoricalVarWeightCalc(ScapeRInterface scapeR,
                        String rVariable,
                        String variableName,
                        String variableDesc,
                        double scaling)
                         throws RFaceException,
                                InvalidDataException
        Construct a set of weightings at each factor level of variableName.
        Parameters:
        scapeR - scape R interface
        rVariable - the R variable that will be used as the basis for weighting, eg: children$sol1
        variableName - the name of the R variable, eg: sol1
        variableDesc - description of the R variable. Used for display purposes.
        scaling - an amount to multiple every weight by
        Throws:
        RFaceException - if problem reading category proportions of variable from R
        InvalidDataException - if weights do not sum to 1. See validate().

      • validateAndNotify

        public void validateAndNotify()
                       throws InvalidDataException
        Description copied from interface: ParameterSet
        Process a change to the parameter set (ie: the underlying TableModel). Validates the values then notifies all Observers that there has been a change. External methods should call this after making any changes to the underlying TableModel.
        Specified by:
        validateAndNotify in interface ParameterSet
        Throws:
        InvalidDataException - if the underlying TableModel values are invalid

      • getWeightBase

        public double getWeightBase()
        Description copied from interface: WeightCalculator
        Return the base, or un-weighted, value of every agent. This may be 1, if 1 agent corresponds to 1 member of the whole population. Or it may be greater than 1 if the number of agents are being scaled up to match a particular population size.
        Specified by:
        getWeightBase in interface WeightCalculator
        Returns:
        weight equal
